# Agent Skills for GitHub Copilot

This directory contains agent skills for GitHub Copilot.

**Skills are also installed in:** `/.claude/skills/` for cross-platform compatibility.

See [AGENTS.md](../../AGENTS.md) for complete documentation.

**Skills Installed:** Core, Engineering, DevOps, Documentation, Research

**Source:** https://github.com/All-The-Vibes/skills-catalog
